Teen.Message 1: Did you know that teens actually like having responsibilities? It makes them feel more independent and grown up. Allow your teen to choose a special job that helps out.
Teen.Message 2: As your teen shows more responsibility, you can also give them extra privileges. Try to share responsibilities equally amongst women/men and girls/boys. Praise your teen whenever they do their job!

Baby.Message: Routines will make your children feel safe and secure. Try to have regular mealtimes and bedtimes. Remember to schedule One-on-One time with your children, too!

Young child.Message 1: Routines will make your children feel safe and secure. Try to have regular mealtimes and bedtimes. Remember to schedule One-on-One time with your children, too!
Young child.Message 2: When you teach your children about safe distancing, you keep your whole family safe. You keep others safe, too!
Young child.Message 3: You can even make safe distancing into a game where children earn points for keeping at least 1 metre away from others in public. The one with the most points can win a simple, free reward like extra One-on-One Time
